overview: When Spencer (Yousef Abu-Taleb) is mistakenly delivered the wrong phone from the 4 Winds Repair Company, he discovers it has the ability to control people with it's emojis. Now the Mysterious Mr. Moji (voiced by Jeff Minnerly) has come to reclaim what is rightfully his before Spencer can do more harm than good, by any means necessary. The Amazing Mr. Moji stars: Yousef Abu-Taleb (Bite-Me) Carly Jones (Lonelygirl15), Joy Regullano (Supernatural) and Jeff Minnerly (Metroid: Other M)
title: The Amazing Mr. Moji
